# ArraySlice.Index

**Type Alias**

The index type for arrays, `Int`.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Index = Int
```

## Discussion

`ArraySlice` instances are not always indexed from zero. Use `startIndex` and `endIndex` as the bounds for any element access, instead of `0` and `count`.
title: ArraySlice.Index
